Articles.Content:
Besides the obvious (KSP) what other games need multiplayer?

I really want Dwarf Fortress too have it.
The question is, will the multiplayer be used?

The question is, will the multiplayer be used?

No.

I thought of another, Skyrim. TROLOLOLOLOOOO

No.

I thought of another, Skyrim. TROLOLOLOLOOOO

Skyrim doesn\'t need multiplayer. That would screw up the single player experience. Thats what mods are for, Giving games multiplayer.

Skyrim doesn\'t need multiplayer. That would screw up the single player experience. Thats what mods are for, Giving games multiplayer.

Nothing more true.

Orbiter 2010 needs multiplayer.

Ummm Orbiter2010 does have Multiplayer. A public server used to be hosted by me and is now hosted by RhenDark located here: http://omp.dyndns-server.com/

Everything you need to do and how to setup is on the website! If you do not have access to your router or a way to forward ports in the router you may run into issues be warned!

Everything you need to do and how to setup is on the website! If you do not have access to your router or a way to forward ports in the router you may run into issues be warned!

Ugh. I am missing something here.
